title: GM
content: [{"type":"p","children":[{"text":"You are still very early.  "}]},{"type":"p","id":"761e924b-e1ed-47f4-9deb-e93548bb0cb2","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"1fb7bbad-cd56-47d1-857c-36f874aee0ad","children":[{"text":"Remember how long the internet cycle took. I was first on the internet iin 1987, then nothing more than a shell account in undergrad and vague instructions how to route emails or search Archie, Gopher and Veronica.  "}]},{"type":"p","id":"1c1e4cd9-b343-4c90-9ba3-3c8f8d7ea397","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"a44dc5c1-dcf6-40b1-bd4f-3a5119ccd048","children":[{"text":"Five years later, and I was running an “internet company\", which was basically routing business traffic through a Netblazer router to a leased 56K frame relay line.  "}]},{"type":"p","id":"4e65974f-c8c6-49b1-8268-6dcdaa2f84ee","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"a0b0f0db-4a09-4b62-9876-ee779f8d983d","children":[{"text":"Five years after that was considered “the early internet”, and it would still be 5 more years until “serious people and businesses” started using the internet in earnest. "}]},{"type":"p","id":"4e6e736a-43f0-4c99-b605-956c0c087bc6","children":[{"text":""}]},{"type":"p","id":"4912e395-3737-476a-b1c6-49c7d11b79ae","children":[{"text":"You are still very early, young man. Keep building "}]}]
